QuestData.Title: Taretha's Diversion
QuestData.Description: It was Taretha who created the original diversion at Durnholde, allowing Thrall to escape.$B$BNow the Infinite have captured Taretha. The diversion will not happen without our involvement. You must use the incendiary devices that I give you and burn down the internment lodges.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Durnholde Keep and set 5 incendiary charges at the barrels located inside each of the internment lodges using the Pack of Incendiary Bombs given to you by Erozion.$B$BSpeak to Thrall in the basement prison of Durnholde Keep when you have the Internment Lodges Set Ablaze.
QuestData.RewardText: You are friends of Taretha? So this is her new plan? Very well then...
